ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: No I never said this I said they either have to accept that this is a game for people who have lots of time or move on. If they can t accept that then they
ygData.messageBody:
No I never said this I said they either have to accept that this is a game
for people who have lots of time or move on. If they can't accept that then
they should move on. Stuff like the binding issue or how long it takes to
level and so forth. My point is exactly what I said read it again.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) <kblair@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, October 04, 1999 10:09 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
>> I'm going to have to agree Everquest is a game for
>> people who have lots of time on their hands. It's
>> something the casual player is going to have to
>> either accept or move on.
>
>What is your point? That people that don't spend a
>lot of time in EQ should move on? I know people that
>only play one hour every other day and have a great
>amount of fun.
>
>>
